text_block_list.text: A while after I become Twin Turbo Trainer…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Doryaaaaaaaaa! ! 
Turbo Engine, let's goooooooooo!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Haaah, Haah, 	*cough*… *cough* 
Kyuuuuh.

Twin Turbo never change. 
Doing her best from start to finish.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Huff, huff… Oeyaa～ 
ugh… Oeeee～

The type of run that drain her 
physical strength and energy.

Twin Turbo enjoy the "now" from 
the bottom of her heart.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Oeeeeee… T-Trainer…! 
Turbo can… still… run… oehhh!

While look like a flattened dog… 
Twin Turbo desperately speaking while still facing the ground.
choice_data_list: Shall we end here for today?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Not yet, just this much, Turbo can still…! ! 
The next one… I'm going to surpass the time!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: One more time… Engine, mo… ve ughhh……

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Unununununu～……! ! 
Turbo can still stand up!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Guuuuuu…… gah!!

Training always end like this. 
That's why the next day, and the day after that…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Haah, haah… haaa…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
T-Turbo will run much more than yesterday…! 
Today's turbo is better than yesterday! !

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Haah,hah… Yes!! 
…eh?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
You are smiling!! 
Trainer is always smiling!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Turbo also always smiling! I'm feeling great!! 
Doryaaaaaaa! !

… And just like that she always run until she 
run out of energy, because of that the schedule 
become messed up.

The paperwork was running far behind schedule. 
The work continued until midnight, and fatigue 
was setting in.

From other perspective it look like I was just 
getting pushed around, and while that's true…

It's fun watching Twin turbo running at full power. 
Just by watching her it feel like you are getting 
pulled by her momentum.

The fact that Twin Turbo said "you are always smiling" 
is probably the result of that.

As long as possible… No, I want Twin Turbo to 
keep running. Running in the way that she enjoy 
the most, forever.

But still, it's fun even though it's painful… 
I think while crossing my arm.
choice_data_list: …I wonder if we start to become similar.

text_block_list.text:
I wonder if it possible for Trainer to become 
similar to the Horse girl they are in charge of. 
There is no way, I thought, but―

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ahahahaha!! It's fun! It hurt! 
Trainer, are you watching!?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Pweh, It's… so… fun *cough* *cough* 
Ehehehe… uweeh.

And just like that I continue watching Twin Turbo running 
without brake day after day. No matter how many time 
the schedule has change and no matter how tired I become.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Kyuuuuuuh……

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ununu…… Just a little more! 
Ehehehe… It's so fun!

With a smile from the heart, 
I could feel the same feeling.
